text: Gordon Frederick Arnold (22 January 1920 - 30 December 1999) was a British linguist and Emeritus Reader in Phonetics at University College London. ==Books== * Arnold, G.F. and Gimson, A.C (1965). English Pronunciation Practice. London: University of London Press * Intonation of Colloquial English, with J. D. O'Connor (Longman, 1961; second edition, 1973) * English Words (North-Holland, 1957) * Say it with Rhythm, with O.M. Tooley (Longman, three parts, 1971-73) ==See also== *Daniel Jones (phonetician) *A. C. Gimson ==References== Category:1920 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Linguists from England Category:Phonologists Category:Phoneticians Category:Linguists of English Category:Academics of University College London
title: Gordon Frederick Arnold
